content: *use these markers to save your place without damaging your favorite book bookmark on the left is gryffindor colors harry potter s house bookmark on the right is slytherin or make them in your own school colors lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70504ad published in by kids for kids skill level easy wool-ease® article #620 2 colors 1 ball each slytherin colorway a 620-180 forest green heather b 620-151 grey heather gryffindor colorway a 620-138 cranberry b 620-171 gold crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm crochet hook - size f-5 3 75 mm bookmarks are worked in single_crochet u s smaller crochet hook is used to attach fringe to each end
